name: Prestige Immortal Journey Sona
description: A virtuoso artist radiating passion in whatever she does, Sona paused her promising music career to enroll in fashion school. Now a graduate, the Gala is the first showing of her debut line, and Sona is more than happy to let her work do the talking. Unlike her classmates, she has no dreams of becoming immortal through her designs. The journey is enough.
